Services.title: Our Services

Services.bazi_description: Gain deep insights into your personality, potential, and future.

FeaturedMaster.title: Featured Master
FeaturedMaster.master_bio: With 30 years of experience in Bazi and Feng Shui, Master Xuanji is dedicated to helping people find clarity and direction in life.

InteractiveTool.title: Try Our Interactive Bazi Tool
InteractiveTool.description: Enter your birth information to get your personalized Bazi chart and interpretation instantly.
InteractiveTool.tarot_description: Draw a card to see what the universe has in store for you today.
InteractiveTool.zodiac_description: Enter your and your partner's zodiac signs to see your compatibility.

Testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
Testimonials.testimonial_1_text: This is the most accurate Bazi reading I've ever had. It gave me so much clarity on my career path.
Testimonials.testimonial_2_text: The synastry chart was incredibly insightful for my relationship. I understand my partner so much better now.
Testimonials.testimonial_3_text: I was skeptical about AI reading at first, but the report was surprisingly detailed and accurate. Highly recommended!

CallToAction.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?

CallToAction.dialog_description: Enter your email to receive mystical insights from the universe.
